name: Crash Dummy
description: A challenging 2D platformer with numerous and pure mechanics to keep you interested throughout its unique adventure. Blast, burn, freeze your way through a story-driven adventure with a unique set of endearing characters. Jump long distances and do wall-runs for some stylish ninja action.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP SP3, Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 5 years or younger. Integrated graphics and very low budget cards may not work Storage: 300 MB available space
